videos.description: After the Patriots' win over the Bills, P.K. Subban found his way to the Patriots' locker room to get a jersey signed from Tom Brady.
videos.headline: P.K. Subban visits Brady in locker room

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis ( P.K. Subban visits Brady in locker room) 2018/12/23
